name: Jigsaw Block Puzzles Cute Unlimited Epic Play Free
name_original: Jigsaw Block Puzzles Cute Unlimited Epic Play Free
description:
Jigsaw Puzzles is a jigsaw game with more beautiful pictures in a wide variety of categories.


Features:

- 3 in 1 Classic Puzzle , Puzzle Logic , Puzzle Mosaic

- 6 difficulty settings Up to 400 pieces.
- Every puzzle is unique: Different piece shapes every time.

- Saves all puzzles in progress, so you can work on several at the same time.

- Complete challenging goals.

- 1080p HD Graphics.
